name: augmentor
description: React like hooks for the masses

scripts.build: npm run cjs && npm run clean && rollup --config rollup.config.js && npm run min && npm run test && npm run size
scripts.min: echo '/*! (c) Andrea Giammarchi - ISC */' > min.js && uglifyjs index.js -c -m >> min.js
scripts.size: cat index.js | wc -c;cat min.js | wc -c;gzip -c9 min.js | wc -c;cat min.js | brotli | wc -c

author: Andrea Giammarchi
